Subject: Payment of outstanding dues for Acc. 2038029628
--------------------------------------------------


Dear Customer,

Monthly bill payment of AED 703.25 for Account no. 2038029628 is due. Please settle the payment to ensure service continuity. Please pay through www.dewa.ae/pay?ac=2038029628 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/vF7bCwRG4iV9GmNUVf7cJwVUf?domain=dewa.ae> .
For more information or inquiries, please contact our Customer Care Centre at customercare@dewa.gov.ae, or call 04-6019999.

Your happiness is our priority.
Dubai Electricity & Water Authority 






 <https://www.dewa.gov.ae/emailer/greenbill/images/dewa_footer_en.bmp>
